h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Captain Lotus-Vision
content: More importantly, the purple seals on many of the cell doors are now gone in the Pagoda Realm, allowing you to kick them down and access a few secrets. There's some we haven't encountered in the Upper Pagoda, but be sure to go back and check these cells:
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Lower Pagoda (Level 2)' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Captain Lotus-Vision'.
The content is as follows:
More importantly, the purple seals on many of the cell doors are now gone in the Pagoda Realm, allowing you to kick them down and access a few secrets. There's some we haven't encountered in the Upper Pagoda, but be sure to go back and check these cells:
